column.name: mstn
column.comment: station id take from file.. should match merged station id in statio lib

column.name: dtype
column.comment: data type take from file name... cdc,rdc,cdca,rdca,...

column.name: year
column.comment: total number of records read from file

column.name: month
column.comment: total number of good records (successfully decoded)

column.name: day
column.comment: total number of good records (successfully decoded)

column.name: count
column.comment: total number of records with no data (i.e. empty lines)
